publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3568 Murdo Fraser: Result of Gibraltar Referendum-That the Parliament acknowledges the right of the people of Gibraltar to self-determination; welcomes the overwhelming vote on 7 November 2002 of the people of Gibraltar against shared sovereignty of the Rock between the United Kingdom and Spain, and calls on Her Majesty's Government to terminate forthwith all negotiations with the Spanish Government that would progress the rejected principle of shared sovereignty. Supported by: Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Alex Johnstone*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Mr Keith Harding*, Ben Wallace*

S1M-3568 Murdo Fraser: Result of Gibraltar Referendum-That the Parliament acknowledges the right of the people of Gibraltar to self-determination; welcomes the overwhelming vote on 7 November 2002 of the people of Gibraltar against shared sovereignty of the Rock between the United Kingdom and Spain, and calls on Her Majesty's Government to terminate forthwith all negotiations with the Spanish Government that would progress the rejected principle of shared sovereignty. Supported by: Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Alex Johnstone, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Keith Harding, Ben Wallace
S1M-3568 Result of Gibraltar Referendum (lodged on 12 November 2002) Phil Gallie*
S1M-3568 Result of Gibraltar Referendum (lodged on 12 November 2002) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
